item.title: Martyn Lloyd Jones Resources
item.description: I am quite the fan of listening to podcasts and whatnot as I drive around in my van, and I have recently been listening to various Dr. Martyn Lloyd Jones audio sermons. These are quite brilliant, and highly recommended. The MLJ Trust has made available over 1600 recorded sermons from the great man himself, all for free. There is also a mobile app available, which makes the collections easy to navigate, has a built in player, and has a significant introduction to each sermon.

item.title: The Forbidden Chapter Isaiah 53
item.description:
Today I came across Tree of Life Ministries, and specifically this really great demonstration of using Isaiah 53 in preaching to Jews.

Seemingly most are not even aware of what the chapter says, let alone who it is actually talking about!

item.title: An Old William Lane Craig Debate
item.description:
Whilst browsing at some William Lane Craig videos yesterday, I came across this debate that I had not seen before.

It is from 1998 and he is debating with Dr. Keith Parsons, a Professor of Philosophy and a non-believer.

item.title: About
item.description: Welcome! This site will be an overview and study of books of the bible, along with deeper looks into specific topics. Along the way there will be reviews and recommendations of books, audio and video, along with anything else I think others would find beneficial. Blessings!
